version_description:
- Bugs fixes
- Adding multiple Homepage UI and KMB/KMOB Detail page UI variants
- Updating KMB/KMOB Installment Simulation feature

Not just a new year, KPM also has a new face!
enjoy the convenience of credit with a new look that is more fresh and up to date.

For Kreditmu lovers, Kreditmu application via KPM is halted for a while.
But don't worry, you can still enjoy other KPM services and features that aren't less interesting to achieve your resolution this year.

Let's update your KPM now!

Demi dukung pemerintah untuk tangani Covid-19
Kami mau kamu cukup #DiRumahAja

- Akses pembayaran langsung di beranda
- Pembatasan pengajuan hanya Pinjaman Dana Tunai & Kredit Motor Baru
- Optimalisasi kamera
- Bug fixing

Transaksi tetap nyaman, semua tetap aman #DiRumahAja
